citation.case_name: Connecticut Department of Public Safety v. Doe, Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated

html_with_citations:
537 U.S. 967

CONNECTICUT DEPARTMENT OF PUBLIC SAFETY ET AL.
v.
DOE, INDIVIDUALLY AND ON BEHALF OF ALL OTHERS SIMILARLY SITUATED.

No. 01-1231.

Supreme Court of United States.

October 21, 2002.

1

CERTIORARI TO THE UNITED STATES COURT OF APPEALS FOR THE SECOND CIRCUIT.

2

C. A. 2d Cir. [Certiorari granted, 535 U. S. 1077.] Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
